author: jih2nn
content: FYI, the [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9381) to revamp the EL part of the EIP has been finally merged. It had a link to the execution-apis, which was a blocker, and it's displaced by another [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9851). Thanks for handling all of this <@348512261955911691>!

author: sibkatya
content:
Hello, here is an initial draft of CL metrics.  If some of these metrics are not relevant or you need any other specific metrics, feel free to leave your comments. And let's discuss them in Berlin as well.
https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-metrics/pull/16
I had a version and a dashboard for Prysm, but it's a bit outdated. Need to merge the updates.

Also, now we have a freshly baked repo for execution metrics specs. <@845691100072509460> and other clients, if you have some ideas for EL metrics, would be great to hear from you. Feel free to open issues and PRs.
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-metrics
